description: Aspects of admiralty & maritime jurisdiction, including liens & arrest of ships, bills of lading, charter parties, marine insurance, securities, collisions & groundings, salvage, pilotage, towage, wreck, bounty & ransom.
prerequisites: All Level 1 LAWS courses + LAWS2111 + LAWS2112
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB, LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
